description: Local emulation of Content Delivery Networks.
author: Thomas Rientjes
title: Decentraleyes
name: decentraleyes

preferences.description: Automatically prepend a notice to retrieved documents to signal local delivery.
preferences.name: addNotice
preferences.title: Add comments to locally fetched files

preferences.description: Cancel the intercepted request if the required resource is not locally available.
preferences.name: blockMissing
preferences.title: Block requests for missing resources
